text: (Dutare,) ‘‘benkiyu (bandu) tinnuvantaha ondu balipraniyannu nam'ma munde taruva tanaka navu yava dutanannu nambabaradendu allahanu nam'ma jote kararu madiruttane’’ ennuvavarodane heliri; ‘‘nanaginta hindeyu halavu dutaru spasta puravegalondige (matravalla) niviga keluttiruva drstantadondige nim'ma balige bandiddaru. Nivu satyavantaragiddare, nivu avarannu kondudeke?’’
